item.title: GOVIND PRAKASH
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: Govind is a Seasoned Veteran in the field of Sales, Business Development and Services. He brings in 23 years of strong Telecom, and IT Solution Selling experience. Earlier he was with HCL and Arvind Mills Ltd (Telecom Division), heading the Sales for their Telematics Business and Home Land Security. With this Strong Leadership and Business Management skills he wishes to create a strong presence in Surveillance Industry with state of art technologies.
item.excerpt:encoded: He brings in 23 years of strong Telecom, and IT Solution Selling experience. He brings in 23 years of strong Telecom, and IT Solution Selling experience.

item.title: SRIDHAR SINGISETTY
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: Sridhar brings with him over 15 years of Industry experience in software engineering, Consulting, Product management and Software Development. He held several Technical and Leadership positons In Organisations Like, Cisco, Nokia Siemens, Motorola and Mindtree Consulting. With this strong Leadership and Technical abilities he along with other founders wishes to take Surveillance along with Security to a next level.
item.excerpt:encoded: He brings with him over 15 years of Industry experience in software engineering, Consulting, Product management and Software Development

item.title: RAGHAVENDRA HEGDE
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: Raghavendra brings with him over 18 years of Industry experience in software product life cycle.He is an alumni of IIM Bangalore and has held several technical and leadership positons in organizations Like, Bell Labs India, Intel, Motorola and Infosys. With strong product development, people management and operations background, wishes to bring innovative cutting edge solutions in video analytics and security for the customers of City Surveillance Services.
item.excerpt:encoded: He brings with him over 18 years of Industry experience in software product life cycle. He is an alumni of IIM Bangalore and has held several technical and leadership positons.

item.title: Vendor Management
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: CSS Solution facilitates smooth and safe vendor managment using video analytics capabilities.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• VENDOR REGISTRATION
  • GEO FENCING

item.title: Visitor Management
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: CSS Solution provides elegant visitor management solution for the residential complexes. Solution provided is again video analytics based and eliminates human errors and lapses.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• FACIAL RECOGNITION
  • VEHICLE NUMBER PLATE DETECTION
  • AUTOMATIC PEOPLE COUNT

item.title: Safety
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: City Surveillance Services solution has in built safety features which will keep the residents safe 24/7.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• PERIMETER INTRUSION DETECTION
  • LOITERING DETECTION
  • FIRE DETECTION

item.title: Video Surveillance
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
VIDEO SURVEILLANCE AS SERVICE

City Surveillance Services provides unique offerring in providing the video surveillance of premises as a service . WIth the service model customers do not have to invest on the infrastructure (cameras, DVR/NVR etc) for the video surveillance. City surveillance services provides the customer with the infrastructure and maintains the infrastructure through Annual maintenance contracts. WIth industry leading SLA's there is minimal downtime and the City Surveillance Services will repair,replace and upgrade the infrastructure as required. Hence a hassle free experience for the customer with insulation from the technology obselecense as well. Customers have option for outright purchase of equipment as well from the large selection of providers as per their specifications. CSS partnerships with OEMs and System Integrators will ensure the best available price for the equipment
item.excerpt:encoded:
• 24/7 MONITORING
  • EXCEPTION ALERTS
  • RECORD AND PLAYBACK

Director of IIIT-Bangalore is an alumni of Madras University, India and Purdue University, USA. He taught for 25+ years at IIT Kanpur, IIM Bangalore, IIT Madras and IIIT-Bangalore.He serves on the boards of Bharat Electronics, Neyveli Lignite Corporation and Indian Renewable Energy Agency and IIIT-Bhubaneshwar, IIIT-Delhi and IBAB earlier he was also on the Board of Bank of India, NMDC, VisualSoft, Megasoft, Informatics and Shawman Software. Prof. Sadagopan is a Member of Karnataka Knowledge Commission, Chief Minister's Vision Group on IT, NASSCOM Regional Council and ISA Executive Council. He is the Chair of IEEE Computer Society, Bangalore Chapter and a Member of ACM India Council. Currently (till 2011). He is also a Member of WWW Conference Committee (W3CC).

item.title: Video Surveillance as a Service
item.dc:creator: City Surveillance
item.content:encoded:
City Surveillance Services provides unique offerring in providing the video surveillance of premises as a service . WIth the service model customers do not have to invest on the infrastructure (cameras, DVR/NVR etc) for the video surveillance. City surveillance services provides the customer with the infrastructure and maintains the infrastructure through Annual maintenance contracts. WIth industry leading SLA's there is minimal downtime and the City Surveillance Services will repair,replace and upgrade the infrastructure as required. Hence a hassle free experience for the customer with insulation from the technology obselecense as well. Customers have option for outright purchase of equipment as well from the large selection of providers as per their specifications. CSS partnerships with OEMs and System Integrators will ensure the best available price for the equipment.

24/7 MONITORING

City Surveillance services maintains a central control room with the feed from all the installations and will act as second level of alert management center to reach appropriate personnel on the ground to take actions on the exceptions.

EXCEPTION ALERTS

With its prorietary advaced video analytics solutions City Surveillance Services detects the exception scenarios and alerts the designated personnel. Exceptions like intruder, unregistered vendor, visitor or access to restricted areas etc are alerted.

RECORD AND PLAYBACK

CSS will maintain the footage from every camera in its network for a minimum period of 60 days in addition to the 30 days storage that's provided in every customer premises.Stored footages can be reviewed anytime with playback facility based on date and time.

item.title: SAFETY FEATURES
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
City Surveillance Services solution has in built safety features which will keep the residents safe 24/7.

PERIMETER INTRUSION DETECTION

CSS Solution is capable of detecting the perimeter instution/ breaches with video analytics and generate appropriate alarms. Alerts could be audio alarms along with alerts to the security incharge.

LOITERING DETECTION

With the state of the art video analytics CSS Solution will detect loitering in restricted and unsafe areas and alert the security personnel. Access to areas like electrical installations, unguarded terraces,unsafe water bodies can be marked for alerts.

FIRE DETECTION

CSS Solution detects the fire in the premises and generates alerts. This is usefull in emergency fire due to electrical short circuit etc where there are no smoke/fire detectors available. Alerts are based on visuals from the camera and are realtime.
